Package: uniandes.unacloud.web.controllers

[Groovy] Class AdminController

    • uniandes.unacloud.web.controllers.AdminController

    • This Controller contains actions to manage Users by Admin User: User crud, set restrictions . This class render pages or process requests in services to update entities, there is session verification before all methods to verify that only admin could use services.

      Authors:
      CesarF
